title: Pelicans, Hawks advance in play-in tournament
description:
Jalen & Jacoby discuss CJ McCollum’s big night for the New Orleans Pelicans. Next up are the Los Angeles Clippers, can this young team keep it rolling? Also, Trae Young leads the Atlanta Hawks to a play-in win over the Charlotte Hornets. Jalen Rose has a reminder for all you NBA fans that you don’t want to miss. Plus, we preview the Chicago Bulls vs the Milwaukee Bucks and Toronto Raptors vs the Philadelphia 76ers. Which players are under the most pressure? Might it be James Harden? Listen to find out. Also, Clayton Kershaw was pulled early while pitching a perfect game! Do the guys agree or disagree with the call? All this and more… 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
